Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.compilers

Interface JctFlagBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavacJctFlagBuilderImpl
@API(since="0.0.1", status=EXPERIMENTAL) public interface JctFlagBuilder
Interface for defining a common flag builder for compilers.
Author:
Ashley Scopes
